About-us-info: The profession Manufacturer of ALternator & deisel generator set
About-us-detailInfo-1: SGSGREEN POWER CO., LTD located in Fujian, Chinese Motor Electric City, is specialized in manufacturing and exporting a wide range of Alternator ,Diesel Generator set, Our company possesses modern standard workshops, equipped with advanced and excellent production, machining and testing equipment,  We have  professional engineers, skilled QC members, and have an efficient administrative producing system.
About-us-detailInfo-2: We are able to meet our customers' demands, providing them with superior quality products.Our products have been granted with the certificates of CE,  ISO9001:2008, SONCAP and SGS.  owing to reasonable price, high efficiency and energy saving performance,are widely praised by clients in over 30 countries and regions.our products are extensively used in building site,Factory,Hospital,Shopping Mall,Army and other industries,ect.
